Title: PortalSiteMapProvider list driven cross site collection navigation
Description: An easily controlled cross site collection top navigation for SharePoint 2010.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An easily controlled cross site collection top navigation for SharePoint 2010.

Features
  • No masterpage editing
  • Manage navigation from a list
  • Supports two levels of ordered navigation
  • Consistent navigation across site collections
  • Easy! Activate a feature in each site collection to apply the navigation.
